cube noun [C]
(SHAPE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a solid object with six square sides of equal size: Cut the cheese into small cubes.

cube verb [T]
(NUMBER)
mathematics
  specialized If you cube a number, you multiply it twice by itself: 2 cubed (= 2 x 2 x 2) equals 8, and is written 23.

(NUMBER)
mathematics the number made by multiplying a number twice by itself: The cube of 2 (= 2 x 2 x 2) is 8.
